name: Baby Life 3D!
description:
Your choices will determine what is going to happen in this gripping story. Your baby is about to come!

Now it's time for you to see what being a mom feels like! Just as a real parent, it is your responsibility to decide!
Will you share your happiness with your family or will you keep it as a secret?
There are so many questions that you have to answer. These answers will determine your newborn's well being.

Make a nice drink for yourself and enjoy being a parent right now!
